contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox District DE | name=Halberstadt | state=Saxony-Anhalt | former regierungsbezirk=[[Magdeburg (region)|Magdeburg]] | dissolved = 2007-07-01 | capital=[[Halberstadt]] | area=664.99 | population=77,876 | population_as_of=2002 | density=117 | carsign=HBS | url=[http://www.landkreis.halberstadt.de landkreis.halberstadt.de] | map=saxony_anhalt_hbs.png }} '''Halberstadt''' was a district (''Kreis'') in the middle of [[Saxony-Anhalt]], [[Germany]]. Neighboring districts are (from north clockwise) [[Bördekreis]], [[Quedlinburg (district)|Quedlinburg]], [[Wernigerode (district)|Wernigerode]], [[Goslar (district)|Goslar]], [[Wolfenbüttel (district)|Wolfenbüttel]], [[Helmstedt (district)|Helmstedt]]. == History == The region around Halberstadt was a clerical principality, which emerged with the creation of the [[Bishopric of Halberstadt]] in 804 and existed until the [[Thirty Years' War]]. In 1648 it was secularized and became part of [[Brandenburg-Prussia]] as the [[Principality of Halberstadt]]. During the [[Napoleonic Wars]] it became part of the French-controlled [[Kingdom of Westphalia]], where Halberstadt was the capital of the Département of the Saale. In 1815 it came back to the [[Kingdom of Prussia]], and in 1816 it became part of the ''[[Magdeburg (region)|Regierungsbezirk Magdeburg]]'' within the newly established Prussian [[Province of Saxony]]. At the same time the ''Landkreis'' (district) of Halberstadt was created. In 1825 it was merged with the Osterwieck district. On July 1, 2007, the district was merged with the districts of Quedlinburg and Wernigerode to form the new [[Harz (district)|district of Harz]]. == Geography == The district is located at the northern end of the [[Harz]] mountains. == Coat of arms == {| |- valign=top ||[[Image:Wappen Landkreis Halberstadt.svg|100px|Coat of arms]] ||The coat of arms is the same as that used by the principality and the [[diocese of Halberstadt]] historically. |} ==Towns and municipalities== {| ! width=25% align=left|Towns ! width=50% align=left|[[Amt (political division)|Verwaltungsgemeinschaften]] ! width=25% align=left|Free municipalities |- valign=top || #[[Halberstadt]] || #[[Bode-Holtemme]] (incl. towns [[Schwanebeck]] and [[Wegeleben]]) #[[Harzvorland-Huy]] #[[Osterwieck-Fallstein]] (incl. town [[Osterwieck]]) || #[[Huy, Germany|Huy]] |} == External links == *[http://www.landkreis.halberstadt.de Official website] (German) {{coord missing|Germany}} {{Germany districts saxony-anhalt}} {{Cities and towns in Halberstadt (district)}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Halberstadt (District)}} [[Category:Halberstadt]]
